name: Matthew Richards
text: For being attached to a gas station, I'm surprised that I can't bring myself to rate it any lower than 4-Stars. The food is good, the portions are more than generous, and the lunch buffet is a guilty pleasure. The seating are consists hard plastic benches and tables, and isn't cleaned often enough, if at all during the day.

name: Michael Orr
text: It is in a gas station. Pizza is pretty good. I have had both better and worse. Buffet is a good price

name: Loretta Strawser
text: There is a daily buffet Mon - Fri from 11-2 & 5-7 pizza is excellent

name: Keep It 1000
text: Really good pizza, all around from crust to the toppings

name: Karen Jaggers
text: After we paid for the buffet they told us they were out of pizza.

name: eli wright
text: Love it, but the D. Bowman store in Danville Illinois never answers their phone anymore !!!!!!!!
